cons: May Give Rise To Weight Gain
description: Cashews contain low fat content when compared to other nuts and that too in the oleic acid form which is very healthy for heart.
They are cholesterol free and the antioxidants present keeps you away from heart diseases.
Cashew nuts lower your blood pressure with the help of magnesium present in them.
Daily intake of cashew nut can reduce the risk of developing gallstones up to 25%.
name: Cashew nut

Yes. Cashew nuts are safe to consume and make a great addition to the pregnancy diet, provided you are not allergic to them.
